scripts.build: npm run typecheck && echo 'Quick build (assumes dependencies installed). Use npm run deploy for full install+build.' && npm run build --workspace client
scripts.deploy: npm install --include=dev --workspaces --include-workspace-root && npm run build --workspace client
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV='dev' && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server"
scripts.lint: npm --workspace client run lint && npm --workspace server run lint && npm --workspace activities run lint
scripts.test:activities:scope:hb: sh scripts/with-heartbeat.sh "activities scope test" npm run test:activities:scope
scripts.test:activities:activity:hb: sh scripts/with-heartbeat.sh "activity test" npm run test:activities:activity
scripts.verify:deploy: npm install --include=dev --workspaces --include-workspace-root && npm run build --workspace client
scripts.test:chunks: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm --workspace client test && npm --workspace server test && npm --workspace activities test
scripts.test:chunks:hb: sh scripts/with-heartbeat.sh "typecheck" npm run typecheck && sh scripts/with-heartbeat.sh "client test" npm --workspace client test && sh scripts/with-heartbeat.sh "server test" npm --workspace server test && sh scripts/with-heartbeat.sh "activities test" npm --workspace activities test
scripts.test:codex: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm --workspace client test && npm --workspace server run test:nonport && npm --workspace activities test
scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm --workspace client test && npm --workspace server test && npm --workspace activities test && npm run verify:deploy && npm run verify:server
